Tactics_describe_001.General: Desperate defense to stop attacking each other
Tactics_describe_001.EN: Desperate defense to stop attacking each other
Tactics_describe_001.CN: 以防守为主，分配极少数进攻人员。

Tactics_describe_002.General: Stop the other side attack，Opportunistic counterattack
Tactics_describe_002.EN: Stop the other side attack，Opportunistic counterattack
Tactics_describe_002.CN: 以防守为主，分配少数的进攻人员。

Tactics_describe_004.General: Attack mainly. Break through the other line of defense, to create more goals
Tactics_describe_004.EN: Attack mainly. Break through the other line of defense, to create more goals
Tactics_describe_004.CN: 以进攻为主，分配少数的防守人员。

Tactics_describe_005.General: Full attack, easy to be counterattack
Tactics_describe_005.EN: Full attack, easy to be counterattack
Tactics_describe_005.CN: 以进攻为主，分配极少数的防守人员。

Tactics_describe_006.CN: 平均从中路和两翼进攻。

Tactics_describe_007.General: The main attacking line is on both sides of the football field
Tactics_describe_007.EN: The main attacking line is on both sides of the football field

Tactics_describe_008.General: To the left side of the football field as the main offensive route and passing direction, increase the left wing attack
Tactics_describe_008.EN: To the left side of the football field as the main offensive route and passing direction, increase the left wing attack

Tactics_describe_009.General: To the right side of the football field as the main offensive route , increase the right wing attack
Tactics_describe_009.EN: To the right side of the football field as the main offensive route , increase the right wing attack

Tactics_describe_010.General: To the middle of the stadium as the main offensive route and passing direction
Tactics_describe_010.EN: To the middle of the stadium as the main offensive route and passing direction

Tactics_describe_011.General: Short distance passing mode, high ball control and safety, long attack cycle
Tactics_describe_011.EN: Short distance passing mode, high ball control and safety, long attack cycle

Tactics_describe_012.General: Mixed passing mode, moderate ball control and safety
Tactics_describe_012.EN: Mixed passing mode, moderate ball control and safety
Tactics_describe_012.CN: 近距离短传和长距离冲吊结合。

Tactics_describe_013.General: Long distance pass, ball control rate, low security, effective offensive cycle is short.
Tactics_describe_013.EN: Long distance pass, ball control rate, low security, effective offensive cycle is short.

Tactics_describe_014.General: Ball control rate reduction, high counterattack
Tactics_describe_014.EN: Ball control rate reduction, high counterattack

Tactics_describe_016.General: Strong defensive, soccer player fatigue fast
Tactics_describe_016.EN: Strong defensive, soccer player fatigue fast
Tactics_describe_016.CN: 高强度的压迫方式，容易造成抢断同时体力消耗较大。

Tactics_describe_017.General: The defensive ability is weak, the football player is slow
Tactics_describe_017.EN: The defensive ability is weak, the football player is slow
Tactics_describe_017.CN: 低强度的压迫方式，有较小几率造成抢断同时体力消耗较小。

Tactics_describe_018.General: Occasionally prevent the other pass, while reducing the chance of fouls
Tactics_describe_018.EN: Occasionally prevent the other pass, while reducing the chance of fouls
Tactics_describe_018.CN: 保守形式进行铲球，有较小几率抢断。

Tactics_describe_019.CN: 正常强度的铲球，有一定几率抢断。

Tactics_describe_020.General: Frequently prevent the other pass, while increasing the Probability of fouls
Tactics_describe_020.EN: Frequently prevent the other pass, while increasing the Probability of fouls
Tactics_describe_020.CN: 凶狠铲球，高几率抢断同时易造成犯规。

Tactics_describe_021.General: Defensive efficiency is low, the team fatigue is slow
Tactics_describe_021.EN: Defensive efficiency is low, the team fatigue is slow
Tactics_describe_021.CN: 球员在自己的防守区域内进行防守。

Tactics_describe_022.CN: 球员会根据自己位置主要盯固定目标。

Tactics_describe_023.General: increase the other side offside chance, easy to fight back
Tactics_describe_023.EN: increase the other side offside chance, easy to fight back

Array_Tips_Unreasonable.General: The current lineup unreasonable may lead to losing the game, please adjust as soon as possible!
Array_Tips_Unreasonable.EN: The current lineup unreasonable may lead to losing the game, please adjust as soon as possible!
Array_Tips_Unreasonable.CN: 当前布阵不合理可能导致比赛失利，请尽快调整！

Home_Describe_001.General: Sign TV right sponsors to get free tokens.
Home_Describe_001.EN: Sign TV right sponsors to get free tokens.
Home_Describe_001.CN: 与电视转播权赞助商签约可以获得免费的Token。

Home_Describe_002.General: You can use different management strategies based on tokens;
Home_Describe_002.EN: You can use different management strategies based on tokens;
Home_Describe_002.CN: 您可以根据Token数量采取不同的管理策略：

Home_Describe_003.General: bid more aggerssively on the market
Home_Describe_003.EN: bid more aggerssively on the market
Home_Describe_003.CN: 在市场中更积极的竞标

Home_Describe_004.General: keep your talent at the club
Home_Describe_004.EN: keep your talent at the club
Home_Describe_004.CN: 把明星球员留在俱乐部

Home_Describe_005.General: get cash from the bank for transfers or buildings
Home_Describe_005.EN: get cash from the bank for transfers or buildings
Home_Describe_005.CN: 从一行取得现金来进行球员交易和建造工程。。。

Home_Describe_008.General: Money is used to pay wages,purchase players,build ground facilities,etc.
Home_Describe_008.EN: Money is used to pay wages,purchase players,build ground facilities,etc.
Home_Describe_008.CN: 资金是用于支付球员年薪、购买球员、建造场地设施等等。

Home_Describe_009.General: You can earn money through player sales, sponsorship deals ,tickets and bank investments.
Home_Describe_009.EN: You can earn money through player sales, sponsorship deals ,tickets and bank investments.
Home_Describe_009.CN: 你可以通过卖出球员、签约赞助、售卖门票或者进行银行投资来赚取资金

Home_Describe_010.General: Treatments can be used to heal an injured player.
Home_Describe_010.EN: Treatments can be used to heal an injured player.
Home_Describe_010.CN: 治疗包可用于一直受伤的球员

Home_Describe_011.General: Treatments are generated by Medical facilities.
Home_Describe_011.EN: Treatments are generated by Medical facilities.
Home_Describe_011.CN: 透过医疗设施可以获得治疗包

Home_Describe_012.General: Fair play is rewarded with a treatment!
Home_Describe_012.EN: Fair play is rewarded with a treatment!
Home_Describe_012.CN: 公平竞赛即可获得治疗包奖励

Home_Describe_013.General: Make sure you watch the match live and your players don't receive cards!
Home_Describe_013.EN: Make sure you watch the match live and your players don't receive cards!
Home_Describe_013.CN: 记得观看现场比赛，而且球员不能拿牌

Home_Describe_014.General: You can get additional Treatments in the Club Shop.
Home_Describe_014.EN: You can get additional Treatments in the Club Shop.
Home_Describe_014.CN: 你可以从俱乐部商店获得更多的治疗包。

Home_Describe_015.General: Morale Boosters can be used to recover player morale.
Home_Describe_015.EN: Morale Boosters can be used to recover player morale.
Home_Describe_015.CN: 士气强化包可以用来激励球员的士气

Home_Describe_016.General: This will lead to better player performance.
Home_Describe_016.EN: This will lead to better player performance.
Home_Describe_016.CN: 可以让球员发挥更好的能力

Home_Describe_017.General: You will get 1 morale booster for every win,0 for a draw but lose 1 booster for a loss
Home_Describe_017.EN: You will get 1 morale booster for every win,0 for a draw but lose 1 booster for a loss
Home_Describe_017.CN: 每次比赛获胜你就会获得1个士气强化包，平手则不会获得，但若比赛落败就会损失1个强化包

Home_Describe_018.General: Support your team by watching the live match and you will be rewarded with a booster!
Home_Describe_018.EN: Support your team by watching the live match and you will be rewarded with a booster!
Home_Describe_018.CN: 观赏球队的现场比赛，表示你对球队的支持，也能获得1个强化包

Home_Describe_019.General: You can get additional Morale boosters in the Club Shop.
Home_Describe_019.EN: You can get additional Morale boosters in the Club Shop.
Home_Describe_019.CN: 你可以从俱乐部商店获取更多的士气强化包

Home_Describe_020.General: Rest points can be used yo recover player fitness .
Home_Describe_020.EN: Rest points can be used yo recover player fitness .
Home_Describe_020.CN: 休息包可用来回复球员体能

Home_Describe_021.General: This will lead to better player performance .
Home_Describe_021.EN: This will lead to better player performance .
Home_Describe_021.CN: 这可以让球员获得更好的表现。

Home_Describe_022.General: Rest points are generated bu Training facilities.
Home_Describe_022.EN: Rest points are generated bu Training facilities.
Home_Describe_022.CN: 透过训练设施可获得休息包

Home_Describe_023.General: Also,give a chance to your bench players, make a substitution in a live match and you will be rewarded with a rest!
Home_Describe_023.EN: Also,give a chance to your bench players, make a substitution in a live match and you will be rewarded with a rest!
Home_Describe_023.CN: 此外，如果你给板凳球员机会，让他们在现场比赛中替补上场，也会获得休息包奖励！

Home_Describe_024.General: You can get additional Rests in the Club Shop.
Home_Describe_024.EN: You can get additional Rests in the Club Shop.
Home_Describe_024.CN: 你可以从俱乐部商店获取更多的休息包

Squad_Describe_001.General: Desperate defense to stop attacking each other
Squad_Describe_001.EN: Desperate defense to stop attacking each other
Squad_Describe_001.CN: 拼死防守，阻止对方进攻。

Squad_Describe_002.General: Stop the other side attack，Opportunistic counterattack
Squad_Describe_002.EN: Stop the other side attack，Opportunistic counterattack
Squad_Describe_002.CN: 防守为主。阻拦对方进攻，伺机反击

Squad_Describe_004.General: Attack mainly. Break through the other line of defense, to create more goals
Squad_Describe_004.EN: Attack mainly. Break through the other line of defense, to create more goals
Squad_Describe_004.CN: 进攻为主，突破对方防线，创造更多进球机会

Squad_Describe_005.General: Full attack, easy to be counterattack
Squad_Describe_005.EN: Full attack, easy to be counterattack

Squad_Describe_006.CN: 左翼，中路，右翼均衡进攻

Squad_Describe_007.General: The main attacking line is on both sides of the football field
Squad_Describe_007.EN: The main attacking line is on both sides of the football field
Squad_Describe_007.CN: 以球场两翼为主要进攻路线与传球方向

Squad_Describe_008.General: To the left side of the football field as the main offensive route and passing direction, increase the left wing attack
Squad_Describe_008.EN: To the left side of the football field as the main offensive route and passing direction, increase the left wing attack
Squad_Describe_008.CN: 以球场左翼为主要进攻路线与传球方向

Squad_Describe_009.General: To the right side of the football field as the main offensive route , increase the right wing attack
Squad_Describe_009.EN: To the right side of the football field as the main offensive route , increase the right wing attack
Squad_Describe_009.CN: 以球场右翼为主要进攻路线与传球方向

Squad_Describe_010.General: To the middle of the stadium as the main offensive route and passing direction
Squad_Describe_010.EN: To the middle of the stadium as the main offensive route and passing direction
Squad_Describe_010.CN: 以球场中部为主要进攻路线与传球方向

Squad_Describe_011.General: Short distance passing mode, high ball control and safety, long attack cycle
Squad_Describe_011.EN: Short distance passing mode, high ball control and safety, long attack cycle
Squad_Describe_011.CN: 短距离传球方式，控球率、安全性高，进攻周期长

Squad_Describe_012.General: Mixed passing mode, moderate ball control and safety
Squad_Describe_012.EN: Mixed passing mode, moderate ball control and safety
Squad_Describe_012.CN: 长短混合的传球方式，控球率与安全性适中

Squad_Describe_013.General: Long distance pass, ball control rate, low security, effective offensive cycle is short.
Squad_Describe_013.EN: Long distance pass, ball control rate, low security, effective offensive cycle is short.
Squad_Describe_013.CN: 长距离传球，控球率、安全性低，进攻周期短。

Squad_Describe_014.General: Ball control rate reduction, high counterattack
Squad_Describe_014.EN: Ball control rate reduction, high counterattack
Squad_Describe_014.CN: 控球率降低，反攻机会高

Squad_Describe_016.General: Strong defensive, soccer player fatigue fast
Squad_Describe_016.EN: Strong defensive, soccer player fatigue fast
Squad_Describe_016.CN: 防守压迫力强，球员疲劳快

Squad_Describe_017.General: The defensive ability is weak, the football player is slow
Squad_Describe_017.EN: The defensive ability is weak, the football player is slow
Squad_Describe_017.CN: 防守压迫力弱，球员疲劳慢

Squad_Describe_018.General: Occasionally prevent the other pass, while reducing the chance of fouls
Squad_Describe_018.EN: Occasionally prevent the other pass, while reducing the chance of fouls
Squad_Describe_018.CN: 偶尔阻止对方传球，同时减少犯规几率与吃牌几率

Squad_Describe_020.General: Frequently prevent the other pass, while increasing the Probability of fouls
Squad_Describe_020.EN: Frequently prevent the other pass, while increasing the Probability of fouls
Squad_Describe_020.CN: 频繁阻止对方传球，同时增加犯规几率与吃牌几率

Squad_Describe_021.General: Defensive efficiency is low, the team fatigue is slow
Squad_Describe_021.EN: Defensive efficiency is low, the team fatigue is slow
Squad_Describe_021.CN: 防守效率低，队员疲劳速度慢

Squad_Describe_022.CN: 防守效率高，队员疲劳速度快

Squad_Describe_023.General: Increase the chance of offside, easy to fight back
Squad_Describe_023.EN: Increase the chance of offside, easy to fight back
Squad_Describe_023.CN: 增加对方越位犯规几率，易被反击

Squad_Describe_026.General: The current lineup unreasonable may lead to losing the game, please adjust as soon as possible!
Squad_Describe_026.EN: The current lineup unreasonable may lead to losing the game, please adjust as soon as possible!
Squad_Describe_026.CN: 当前布阵不合理可能导致比赛失利，请尽快调整！

Transfers_Describe_003.CN: 你想立即获得银行的投资么

Transfers_Describe_004.General: You don't have enough{$Currency} to complete this operation
Transfers_Describe_004.EN: You don't have enough{$Currency} to complete this operation

Transfers_Describe_006.General: Not qualified for next round.Bid to qualify.
Transfers_Describe_006.EN: Not qualified for next round.Bid to qualify.

Transfers_Describe_011.General: Not yet qualified but now leading
Transfers_Describe_011.EN: Not yet qualified but now leading

Transfers_Describe_014.General: get more funds for your club
Transfers_Describe_014.EN: get more funds for your club
Transfers_Describe_014.CN: 为你的俱乐部获取更多资金

Transfers_Describe_015.CN: 将球员卖给足球代理人

Transfers_Describe_016.General: You will get cash immediately and free space for new players
Transfers_Describe_016.EN: You will get cash immediately and free space for new players
Transfers_Describe_016.CN: 你可以立即获得现金以及空位

Transfers_Describe_018.CN: 球员至少需要14人才能参加比赛，不可卖出

Transfers_Describe_020.CN: 终止球员合约需要履行的全部合同金额

Transfers_Describe_021.CN: 尚未和球员签订合约。请和他续约，

Transfers_Describe_023.CN: 你的球队人数已满，没有空间接受更多的球员

Transfers_Describe_024.CN: 卖出或者解雇一些球员才能和新球员签约

Transfers_Describe_025.CN: 你确定要解雇么，确定后将离开俱乐部

Transfers_Describe_026.CN: 该球员已准备好签署合约，在别人签走他之前快签下他

Transfers_Describe_027.CN: 对方经理将有24小时的考虑

Transfers_Describe_030.CN: 正在等待球员的俱乐部对此报价作出决定

Transfers_Describe_031.CN: 设定售价可让提供相同金额的俱乐部自动

Transfers_Describe_032.CN: 你确定要接受这个报价么？如果你可以再等久一点,可能会得到更好的价钱

CHampions_Describe_001.CN: 冠军联赛是本游戏中最受欢迎的比赛

CHampions_Describe_002.CN: 冠军联赛第一阶段是小组赛，由32支球队分成8个小组

CHampions_Describe_003.CN: 每支球队都要 与其他球队进行比赛

CHampions_Describe_004.CN: 形式是包含主场以及客场的巡回赛

CHampions_Describe_005.CN: 每组前两名球队可晋级至八分之一决赛

CHampions_Describe_006.CN: 从此开始淘汰赛的角逐。

CHampions_Describe_007.CN: 而第三名可以参加淘汰赛阶段的NIVAEMAN超级联赛

CHampions_Describe_008.CN: 在淘汰赛阶段，每个小组的第一名会首先与另一个小组的第二名进行比赛

CHampions_Describe_009.CN: 除了决赛会选在第三方场地进行比赛

CHampions_Describe_010.CN: 其他淘汰赛解毒丹的对决都是以主客制分两回合进行

CHampions_Describe_011.CN: 冠军联赛的冠军将自动获得下个赛季的参赛资格

Cup_Describe_001.CN: 比赛采用淘汰制，除了决赛，比赛皆以主客场两回合进行

Cup_Describe_002.CN: 若两队进球数形同，则首先比较客场进球数

Cup_Describe_003.CN: 加时赛打平则进行点球大战，以此来最终决定胜者

Cup_Describe_004.CN: 共有6轮赛事，包含两个回合的资格赛以及四个回合的正赛

Cup_Describe_005.CN: 即八分之一决赛，四分之一决赛，半决赛以及决赛

Cup_Describe_006.CN: 本游戏的所有经理都可以直接参加杯赛的第一轮，

Cup_Describe_007.CN: 因此弱队也有机会逆袭热门球队

NIVEA_Describe_001.CN: NIVEA MEN超级联赛是本游戏中非常受欢迎的比赛

NIVEA_Describe_002.CN: 超级联赛的第一阶段是小组赛，由32支球队分成8个小组

NIVEA_Describe_003.CN: 每支球队都要与同组中的其他球队进行比赛

NIVEA_Describe_004.CN: 形式是包含主场以及客场的巡回赛

NIVEA_Describe_005.CN: 每组前两名球队可晋级至八分之一决赛

NIVEA_Describe_006.CN: 从此开始淘汰赛的角逐

NIVEA_Describe_007.CN: 在淘汰赛阶段，每个小组的第一名会首先与另一个小组的第二名进行比赛

NIVEA_Describe_008.CN: 第一场淘汰赛的胜者将面对冠军联赛小组赛阶段的第三名球队

NIVEA_Describe_009.CN: 除了决赛会选在第三方场地进行

NIVEA_Describe_010.CN: 其他淘汰赛阶段的对决都是以主客制分两回合进行

NIVEA_Describe_011.CN: NIVEA MEN超级联赛的冠军将自动获得下赛季的冠军联赛参赛资格

Associations_Ui_042.CN: 将球员放到这里以便提供租借

Associations_Describe_001.CN: 在协会友谊赛中，你的经理的等级不会影响球员的质量

Associations_Describe_002.CN: 只有球员星级才是最重要的

Associations_Describe_003.CN: 另外，只有主队球员才会损失体力并获得奖励

Associations_Describe_004.CN: 在足球协会中，球队质量取决于球员质量而非经理等级

Associations_Describe_005.CN: 换句话说，所有协会成员在这里都是平等的

Associations_Describe_006.CN: 在足球协会中，你的经理等级不会影响球员的质量

Associations_Describe_007.CN: 而决定团队质量的是球员的星级水平

Associations_Describe_008.CN: 如果你有一名6星球员，其他所有人都会看到这名6星球员

Associations_Describe_009.CN: 与任意等级的足球经理互连

Associations_Describe_010.CN: 创立一个足球协会并带领你的球队走向辉煌

Associations_Describe_012.CN: 每周末都会有锦标赛举行

Associations_Describe_014.CN: 你的球员状态将得到恢复

Associations_Describe_015.CN: 所以无须担心状态下滑

Associations_Describe_016.CN: 要参加锦标赛，你的协会需要有至少4名成员

Associations_Describe_017.CN: 快邀请你的好友加进来

Associations_Describe_019.CN: 每场锦标赛有四个协会参加

Associations_Describe_020.CN: 半决赛是在锦标赛的第一天举行

Associations_Describe_021.CN: 而决赛以及第3名的争夺将在第二天进行

Associations_Describe_022.CN: 每赢得一场比赛可以得到三分，平局可得一分

Associations_Describe_023.CN: 锦标赛结束时，每个协会能得到一份奖励

Associations_Describe_025.CN: 和其他协会成员组织一次短期训练，可增加他们的奖励

Associations_Describe_027.CN: 但在锦标赛期间，你每天只能进行一联合训练

Associations_Describe_028.CN: 你最多可以从其他协会成员那里获得3名球员

Associations_Describe_029.CN: 你获得的租借球员只能参加协会赛事，不能用于其他比赛

Associations_Describe_030.CN: 每个赛季，你的协会都有一次机会晋级到下一级别

Associations_Describe_031.CN: 在赛季结束时，协会积分将减少20%

Associations_Describe_032.CN: 达到白金级别可得到{}作为奖励

Associations_Describe_033.CN: 以至少{0}分的成绩完成赛季，就能晋级到{1}

Associations_Describe_037.CN: 最佳足球协会在赛季结束时获得奖励

Associations_Describe_040.CN: {}在上一次锦标赛中获得第{}名

Associations_Describe_042.CN: 距下一次锦标赛开赛还有

Associations_Describe_043.CN: 与其他协会成员进行的锦标赛之后的训练已经开始

Associations_Describe_045.CN: 查看你的球队并确定需要加强的位置

Finances_Describe_007.CN: 连续四天回来游戏可额外获得

Ground_Describe_001.General: An area of land your fans can park on. Capacity:
Ground_Describe_001.EN: An area of land your fans can park on. Capacity:
Ground_Describe_001.CN: 供球迷停车的空地。容纳车数

Ground_Describe_002.General: A basic stadium,with an initial spectator capacity of 199
Ground_Describe_002.EN: A basic stadium,with an initial spectator capacity of 200
Ground_Describe_002.CN: 起初可容纳200名观众的基本球场

Ground_Describe_003.General: Adds 399 seats.Moderately reduces cost amd time needed to build stadiums and large seat upgrade
Ground_Describe_003.EN: Adds 400 seats.Moderately reduces cost amd time needed to build stadiums and large seat upgrade
Ground_Describe_003.CN: 添加{}个大坐席。适度减少球场建设和大型坐席升级所需的成本和时间

Ground_Describe_004.General: The stadium scoreboard is key to an exciting football atmosphere for both players and fans alike.
Ground_Describe_004.EN: The stadium scoreboard is key to an exciting football atmosphere for both players and fans alike.
Ground_Describe_004.CN: 球场记分牌能营造令人兴奋的足球气氛，对于球员和球迷们都是至关重要的

Ground_Describe_005.General: The stadium spotlights are important for evening games and major events.
Ground_Describe_005.EN: The stadium spotlights are important for evening games and major events.
Ground_Describe_005.CN: 球场聚光灯对于夜间的比赛和大型活动是非常重要的

Ground_Describe_006.General: Special soft grass that minimizes bad pitch conditions that may lead to injury. Reduces the probability of injury by 19%.
Ground_Describe_006.EN: Special soft grass that minimizes bad pitch conditions that may lead to injury. Reduces the probability of injury by 20%.
Ground_Describe_006.CN: 特殊柔软的草皮，尽可能避免场地上可能造成球员受伤的状态。这种类型的球场可降低20%的受伤几率。

Ground_Describe_007.General: Utilities and merchandising upgrades improve the overall experience for your fans during matches and generate additional revenue.
Ground_Describe_007.EN: Utilities and merchandising upgrades improve the overall experience for your fans during matches and generate additional revenue.
Ground_Describe_007.CN: 升级各类设施和商品能提升球迷们在比赛期间的整体体验，并能赚取更多收入。

Ground_Describe_008.General: Medical facilities reduce the severity og injuries as well as generating Treatments for your club
Ground_Describe_008.EN: Medical facilities reduce the severity og injuries as well as generating Treatments for your club
Ground_Describe_008.CN: 医疗设施能降低受伤的严重程度，并能为俱乐部产生治疗包

Ground_Describe_009.General: Youth facilities help your club attract and sign young players
Ground_Describe_009.EN: Youth facilities help your club attract and sign young players
Ground_Describe_009.CN: 青训设施有助于俱乐部吸引和签约年轻球员

Shop_Ui_014.CN: 自定义你的主场和客场球衣

Shop_Describe_001.CN: 看看我们为你提供的钻石优惠

Shop_Describe_002.CN: 现金注资帮助改善你的俱乐部财政状况

Shop_Describe_006.CN: 现金用来支付工资，购买球员，建造地面设施等

Shop_Describe_007.CN: 治疗包可用来加速球员从受伤中恢复

Shop_Describe_008.CN: 士气包用来提高球员的士气

Shop_Describe_009.CN: 休息包用来恢复球员的体力

Shop_Describe_010.CN: 兑换你的礼品卡、游戏卡去领取钻石和其他物品

Shop_Describe_016.CN: 购买这款球衣会给你的球员带来新的气象

Manager_Describe_002.CN: 已邀请{}个朋友加入游戏

Manager_Describe_003.CN: 这些朋友是在你邀请后一周内登录游戏的

Manager_Describe_004.CN: 你推荐的人在一个赛季之内从媒体报道中获得了32个钻石

Manager_Describe_005.CN: 你推荐的人已经观看了25场现场比赛

Manager_Describe_006.CN: 你有{}名推荐人已从他们的手机登录游戏

Manager_Describe_007.CN: 你推荐的人在一场比赛中售出6000张票

Manager_Describe_008.CN: 你推荐的人连续赢得了三场冠军联赛的比赛

Manager_Describe_009.CN: 你的{}名推荐人已训练处一项特殊技能

Manager_Describe_010.CN: 你推荐的人赢得了一次竞标交易

Manager_Describe_012.CN: 在同一赛季中赢得了联赛、冠军联赛和杯赛

Manager_Describe_014.CN: 在你的职业生涯期间赢了70场比赛

Manager_Describe_015.CN: 在你的职业生涯期间你的球员射进了200个球

Manager_Describe_018.CN: 给予其他的足球经理50次支持

Manager_Describe_019.CN: 在一天内进行五场友谊赛

Manager_Describe_020.CN: 3名球员在你参加的一场比赛中拿牌

Manager_Describe_021.CN: 在没有钻石时赢下了最后一轮竞标

Manager_Describe_022.CN: 参加实时比赛时完全压制住你的对手

Manager_Describe_023.CN: 没有介绍人完成该任务

Manager_Describe_024.CN: 推荐人是通过你的邀请而加入游戏的朋友
